title: Emerald Cascade Jhumka: Traditional Vaibhavam Earrings
materials: and vibrant Emerald Gemstones. Features a rich Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting lustre.
features: Intricately designed jhumka showcasing a delicate floral motif at the stud, cascading into a chandelier-like structure. The detailed openwork setting enhances the brilliance of the CZ diamonds and emeralds. Traditional South Indian craftsmanship with a modern, lightweight feel.
colors: Predominantly Gold with dazzling White CZ diamonds and eye-catching Emerald Green gemstones.
occasions: or any special occasion where you desire a touch of timeless elegance. Equally stunning with a silk saree or a contemporary Indian gown.
description: Experience the opulence of traditional South Indian jewelry with these exquisite emerald jhumkas. The exceptional craftsmanship and vibrant emeralds make this piece a true statement of style and heritage. The lightweight design ensures comfortable wear, allowing you to shine all day long. Crafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, known for their superior jewelry making techniques.
